title: User Pages: Your Homepage
content:
Recently found out that when in your user profile you simply write (e.g.) "www.example.tld" Typophile interprets that as [http://typophile.com/www.example.tld](http://web.archive.org/web/20141231090451/http:/typophile.com/www.example.tld "http://typophile.com/www.example.tld") - which produces an error.

I just corrected my entry adding "http://", and , lo, now it works.  
Since I saw that problem in quite a few of your user profiles I thought it worth mentioning.

HAND,  
Andreas
author: Fontgrube

comments.content: Good point! I've often noticed it, too, but never knew (until now) the source of the problem.
Ditto. Just went in to check my own... thankfully it's OK already [hee hee]...
